raw_infobox.name: James Harden
raw_infobox.image: Harden dribbling midcourt, Cavaliers vs Nets on January 17, 2022 (cropped).jpg
raw_infobox.caption: Harden with the Brooklyn Nets in 2022
raw_infobox.college: Arizona State Sun Devils men's basketball (2007–2009)
raw_infobox.highlights:
* NBA Most Valuable Player Award (2017)
* 11× List of NBA All-Stars (2013–2022, 2025)
* 6× All-NBA Team (2013, 2014, 2016–2019)
* 2× All-NBA Team (2012, 2024)
* NBA Sixth Man of the Year Award (2011)
* 3× List of National Basketball Association annual scoring leaders (2017–2019)
* 2× List of National Basketball Association annual assists leaders (2016, 2022)
* NBA All-Rookie Team (2009)
* NBA 75th Anniversary Team
* Consensus first-team NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans (2009 NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans)
* Pac-12 Conference Men's Basketball Player of the Year (2008–09 Pacific-10 Conference men's basketball season)
* 2× First-team List of All-Pac-12 Conference men's basketball teams (2008, 2009)
* No. 13 jersey Arizona State Sun Devils men's basketball#Retired jerseys
* Second-team Parade All-America Boys Basketball Team (2007)
* McDonald's All-American Game (2007 McDonald's All-American Boys Game)
